meanings.definition: A slang term for the police.
meanings.sent1: The sweeneys arrived at the scene to investigate the crime.
meanings.sent2: The sweeneys patrolled the neighborhood to ensure safety.
meanings.sent3: When the sweeneys showed up, everyone knew the party was over.
meanings.sent4: The sweeneys were like hawks, watching over the bustling city.
meanings.sent5: The sweeneys in their uniforms looked formidable and authoritative.

meanings.sent1: The Sweeneys family had a big reunion every summer.
meanings.sent2: Mr. Sweeneys was known for his kindness in the community.
meanings.sent3: The Sweeneys siblings always teased each other at family gatherings.
meanings.sent4: The Sweeneys name carried a legacy of hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent5: The Sweeneys clan was proud of their heritage and traditions.
